questions.question: What types of pumps do you manufacture?
questions.answer: Wilo Mather & Platt specializes in large-capacity engineered centrifugal pumps, including multistage, vertical turbine, non-clog, and axial split-case pumps for water and sewage applications. The India facilities also manufacture multistage ring section pumps, water transfer pumps, twin pump boosters, submersible borehole pumps, and drainage/dewatering pumps.

questions.question: What industries and applications do your pumps serve?
questions.answer: Your solutions cater to sectors such as building services (e.g. pressure boosting, HVAC, drainage), water management (potable water supply, wastewater), and industrial applications.

questions.question: Where are your facilities located?
questions.answer: Wilo India (formerly Wilo Mather & Platt) operates major manufacturing and sales sites in Chinchwad, Pune (Corporate & Manufacturing), Kolhapur, and Kesurdi (Pune region, production site). Additionally, sales offices are located across India, including cities like Delhi, Kolkata, Chennai, Bengaluru, and more.

questions.question: Do you offer technical documentation like datasheets and pump curves?
questions.answer: Yesâ€”technical specifications, including design points, flow, head, efficiency, power consumption, material of construction, and shaft details, are available. For instance, the MISO 150-500 model datasheet provides detailed operational data (82.6 LPS @ 85 m, efficiency ~73.7%).

questions.question: Can we get spare parts for your pumps?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Spare parts such as impellers, shafts, bearings, casings, and gland rings are available for various Wilo/Mather & Platt models (e.g., BST, AST, CST, ETISO, PNISO). These can be custom manufactured in CI, SS, Bronze, or as per client drawing.

questions.question: Do your pumps comply with energy efficiency standards?
questions.answer: Yes, Wilo is known for energy-efficient pumps, including glandless circulating pumps that deliver significant electricity savings (up to 80%), aligning with EU efficiency guidelines.

questions.question: Can I get customized pump solutions or support selecting the right model?
questions.answer: Certainly. Wilo offers custom engineering, product configuration assistance, system design consultancy, and quote generation through its sales and technical support teams across India.

questions.question: What is your company heritage and background?
questions.answer: Founded in India in 1913, Mather & Platt became part of Wilo SE (Germany) in 2005, and transitioned to the brand Wilo India in 2020.

questions.question: What is your typical lead time and export capability?
questions.answer: Wilo India exports globally across Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas, handling complete units and accessories. Lead times vary by product.

questions.question: How can I contact your sales or support team?
questions.answer: You can reach out to the Pune corporate office or visit https://wilo.com/in/en/Local-Information/India/Contact/ for more information.

questions.question: Who is Swanand Mukkawar?
questions.answer: Swanand Mukkawar is a computer science undergraduate student from Pune, India. He is a full-stack developer specializing in AI/LLM integration, building SaaS products, and working with technologies like Next.js, TypeScript, Python, and Flutter. He runs Servex.ai, an AI automation agency.
